##PDB Statistics
Download CSV file from PDB database

```{r}
pdb.stats <- read.csv("Data Export Summary.csv")
```

Calculating something
```{r}
percent <- (pdb.stats$Total/ sum(pdb.stats$Total))*100
names(percent) <- pdb.stats$Experimental.Method
percent
```
